text: Wayne Static (Wayne Richard Wells; November 4, 1965 - November 1, 2014) was an American musician, and the former lead vocalist, guitarist, keyboardist, and music sequencer for the metal band Static-X. He released his first solo studio album, Pighammer, on October 4, 2011. He married porn star Tera Wray in 2008. Static died on November 1, 2014 from a drug overdose in Landers, California. He was 48 years old. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Drug-related deaths in the United States Category:American guitarists Category:Singers from Michigan Category:Singers from Chicago Category:Singers from California Category:Musicians from Michigan Category:Musicians from Chicago Category:Musicians from California
title: Wayne Static
